channel.title: Blackwood Gardens
channel.description: Designing Gardens for you to Love and Enjoy

item.title: Services
item.description:
Garden Design - Planting Design - Garden Advice

Garden Design

Bespoke designs to transform your garden. These start with a detailed brief, survey and site analysis before concept drawings, mood boards and 3D visuals are developed.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Ready to start your next project with us?

item.title: About
item.description: Anna Blackwood runs Blackwood Gardens, she trained in Garden Design at SRUC in Edinburgh and studied horticulture at RGBE and is a pre-registered member of the Society of Garden designers. Anna is a keen gardener, with a wide plant knowledge. She loves the challenge of transforming outdoor spaces into beautiful, practical gardens loved by their owner. Blackwood Gardens is a design studio operating from East Lothian and working across Scotland. We work in partnership with landscape professionals to deliver quality garden transformations.

item.title: Front and Back Garden Dunfermline
item.description:
Back garden

The brief was to improve access around the garden as it had awkward steps, a steep planting bank, slippery deck and rough gravel paths. The owner is a keen gardener and wanted lots of space for planting, a wildlife pond and space to grow vegetables. They also wanted a new seating area with a combined shed/greenhouse building and summerhouse.

item.title: New build garden - Alva
item.description: The brief for this brand new house and garden was to create a garden for socialising, which maximised the view of the hills, provided pollinator friendly planting, space for the hot tub and space to grow some vegetables. Social Patio area with view

item.title: Planting Design Murrayfield
item.description: This newly landscaped garden needed plants! I was brought in to design the planting for the owner who was keen to develop the garden and learn more about the plants. The planting was designed for harmonious colours and seasonal interest. Hesperantha late flowering Perennial Vernena bonariensis

item.title: Show Garden
item.description: SRUC show garden: College show garden at Gardening Scotland 2019 ‘Bayet’ garden winning Silver Gilt

item.title: City Roof Top Terrace - Edinburgh
item.description: Featured large planters to compliment old and new buildings Lower terrace – planted with a selections of grasses, shrubs and trees that can cope with the windy location Upper Terrace – mix of grasses and perennials for bright airy feel with yellows, terracotta’s and red
